resources.string: Head First Java is a beginner-friendly guide to learning Java programming, using an interactive and visual approach to make the concepts easy to understand.
Python Crash Course is a comprehensive guide to learning Python programming, designed for beginners who want to learn quickly and efficiently.
Eloquent JavaScript is a comprehensive guide to the JavaScript programming language, with a focus on writing efficient, maintainable, and reusable code.
Learn to Program is an introduction to the Ruby programming language, providing a step-by-step guide for beginners to get started.
Primer Plus is a comprehensive guide to learning C++ programming, designed for beginners and experienced programmers alike.
"Swift Programming: A Step-by-Step Guide is an introduction to the Swift programming language, designed for those with no prior experience. "
Kotlin in Action is a comprehensive guide to developing applications using the Kotlin programming language, designed for experienced developers.
Learning PHP, MySQL & JavaScript is a beginner-friendly guide to learning PHP, MySQL, and JavaScript, covering the basics of web development.
SQL for Data Analysis is a guide to using SQL for data analysis, teaching the basics of SQL and how to perform various types of data analysis using SQL.
HTML and CSS: Design and Build Websites is a comprehensive guide to creating websites using HTML and CSS, providing an introduction to web design and development.
React Native: Building Mobile Apps with JavaScript is a guide to developing mobile apps using React Native and JavaScript, providing an introduction to mobile app development.
Pro Angular is a comprehensive guide to Angular, a popular JavaScript framework for building dynamic web applications, designed for experienced developers.
Vue.js 2: The Complete Guide is a comprehensive guide to Vue.js, a popular JavaScript framework for building user interfaces, designed for beginners and experienced developers alike.
" Node.js: Up and Running is a beginner-friendly guide to Node.js, a popular platform for building server-side applications using JavaScript."
Go in Action is a comprehensive guide to developing applications using the Go programming language, designed for experienced developers.
